creator: VARK
descriptionHtml:
VARK is an application that allows you to enjoy live events in a virtual space. Just like in real life, you can participate in events that open at a fixed time, and enjoy live performances by artists who are "present" at the scene while feeling a sense of unity. While based on the presence of the real world and the event format, we offer the best experience by fully utilizing the possibilities of the virtual world, such as "singing in front of you" and "the world changes in an instant".


This app is free to play, but you can also pay for it in-game.
Compatible devices: Android 5.0 and above, 64bit devices
Recommended devices: devices with 3GB of RAM or more
Please note that the supported environment and devices may be changed for future updates.
Please note that some devices may not operate on compatible OS versions or higher.
Please play in a stable connection environment.
The information is current as of September 2, 2020.

title: VARK

creator: VARK
descriptionHtml:
VARK is an application that allows users to enjoy a variety of virtual events in a virtual space. For example, in a live event, everyone can participate at a fixed time, just like in real life, and enjoy the live performance of the artists "present" at the event while feeling a sense of unity. While based on the presence of the real world and the format of the event, we will deliver the best experience with a wide variety of content that fully utilizes the possibilities of the virtual world, such as "singing in front of you" and "the world changing in an instant.


This app is free to play, but you can also pay for it in-game.
Compatible devices: Android 5.0 and above, 64bit devices
Recommended devices: devices with 3GB of RAM or more
Please note that the supported environment and devices may be changed for future updates.
Please note that some devices may not operate on compatible OS versions or higher.
Please play in a stable connection environment.
The information is current as of December 17, 2021.

title: VARK

creator: VARK
descriptionHtml:
Sumikkogurashi collaboration is underway!

This metaverse application offers a variety of entertainment content, including live concerts for virtual artists and other events that allow visitors to dive into the world of the characters.
At live concerts, you can experience artists singing and dancing on a variety of high-quality stages right in front of you.
Also, available are Japanese Karaoke anyone can have fun together, and Cinema you can enjoy videos.
We will deliver the best entertainment experience by taking full advantage of the possibilities that only virtual can offer.


~~~~~~~~~~
DOME
Dome is hosting wonderful virtual concerts by virtual artists.
Join us for a concert filled with only possible in a virtual world!


JAPANESE KARAOKE
Your home becomes a karaoke where you can sing as much as you want for unlimited time!
You can create a room and enjoy it alone or with friends.
Send a gift to make the singing more exciting!
If you get together with your friends who attended a concert or event together, you may start an after-party...


CINEMA
You can watch 360-degree videos that make you feel as if you are in the movie.
The facility offers nearly 100 video contents in various genres such as entertainment, sightseeing, animals, and videos of celebrities!
Musical and concert videos will be added in due course!


SQUARE
Square is a portal to the dome where virtual concerts will be held and other facilities!
The plaza may change during an event...!


~~~~~~~~~~~~

This app is free to play, but you can also pay for it in-game.

Compatible devices: Android 5.0 and above, 64bit devices
Recommended devices: devices with 3GB of RAM or more
Please note that the supported environment and devices may be changed for future updates.
Please note that some devices may not operate on compatible OS versions or higher.
Please play in a stable connection environment.
The information is current as of December 17, 2021.
descriptionShort: It offers an entertainment, such as concerts and character events in Metaverse.

Please note that some devices may not operate on compatible OS versions or higher.
Please play in a stable connection environment.
The information is current as of December 17, 2021.
descriptionShort: It offers an entertainment, such as concerts and character events in Metaverse.
title: VARK

creator: VARK
descriptionHtml:
Rilakkuma & Sumikkogurashi collaboration is underway!

This metaverse application offers a variety of entertainment content, including live concerts for virtual artists and other events that allow visitors to dive into the world of the characters.
At live concerts, you can experience artists singing and dancing on a variety of high-quality stages right in front of you.
Also, available are Japanese Karaoke anyone can have fun together, and Cinema you can enjoy videos.
We will deliver the best entertainment experience by taking full advantage of the possibilities that only virtual can offer.

~~~~~~~~~~
DOME
Dome is hosting wonderful virtual concerts by virtual artists.
Join us for a concert filled with only possible in a virtual world!

JAPANESE KARAOKE
Your home becomes a karaoke where you can sing as much as you want for unlimited time!
You can create a room and enjoy it alone or with friends.
Send a gift to make the singing more exciting!
If you get together with your friends who attended a concert or event together, you may start an after-party...

CINEMA
You can watch 360-degree videos that make you feel as if you are in the movie.
The facility offers nearly 100 video contents in various genres such as entertainment, sightseeing, animals, and videos of celebrities!
Musical and concert videos will be added in due course!

SQUARE
Square is a portal to the dome where virtual concerts will be held and other facilities!
The plaza may change during an event...!

~~~~~~~~~~~~

This app is free to play, but you can also pay for it in-game.

Compatible devices: Android 5.0 and above, 64bit devices
Recommended devices: devices with 3GB of RAM or more
Please note that the supported environment and devices may be changed for future updates.
Please note that some devices may not operate on compatible OS versions or higher.
Please play in a stable connection environment.
The information is current as of December 17, 2021.

The facility offers nearly 100 video contents in various genres such as entertainment, sightseeing, animals, and videos of celebrities!
Musical and concert videos will be added in due course!

SQUARE
Square is a portal to the dome where virtual concerts will be held and other facilities!
The plaza may change during an event...!

~~~~~~~~~~~~

This app is free to play, but you can also pay for it in-game.

Compatible devices: Android 5.0 and above, 64bit devices
Recommended devices: devices with 3GB of RAM or more
Please note that the supported environment and devices may be changed for future updates.
Please note that some devices may not operate on compatible OS versions or higher.
Please play in a stable connection environment.
The information is current as of December 17, 2021.
descriptionShort: It offers an entertainment, such as concerts and character events in Metaverse.
title: VARK
